intro: Anthemis eliezrae, commonly known as the Eliezra's Fleabane, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or dry soils and thrives in full sun. Its flowers are yellow with a central disk, and it produces small, hairy seeds that are dispersed by the wind. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
